title: MAG 058 - Trail Rations Transcripts
text:
t is how 
this unsigned letter, if it is to be believed, made its way from an icebound cave 
in Wyoming or Idaho, all the way to the personal collection of Jonah Magnus. 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 058 – Trail Rations 
 
14 
 
 
End recording. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
TIM (DISTANT) 
Look, I’ve tried talking to Elias about it. It doesn’t seem to do any good. 
MARTIN (DISTANT) 
He’s just under a lot of pressure; you know how messed he’s been since 
Prentiss. 
TIM (DISTANT) 
How messed up he’s been? 
MARTIN (DISTANT) 
Of course. I’m sorry. Sorry, I didn’t mean that you weren’t, just– 
TIM (DISTANT) 
No, because I didn’t start stalking my co-workers. 
MARTIN (DISTANT) 
Maybe try talking to him. 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 058 – Trail Rations 
 
15 
 
TIM (DISTANT) 
Sure, like he doesn’t already look at me like I’m a murderer. 
MARTIN (DISTANT) 
Look, okay, we’ve just got to let him work through this. I suggested therapy, 
but he just says no, so– 
TIM (DISTANT) 
Well, we need to do something. 
MARTIN (DISTANT) 
Yeah, maybe. 
[Tape clicks off. Tape clicks on.] 
ARCHIVIST 
The preceding conversation was overheard on 19th November 2016. It 
reaffirms my current worries about Tim, though does go some way to reassure 
me that Martin is unlikely to be the culprit, especially following our earlier 
conversation. (Sigh) I need to be more careful. 
[Tape clicks off.]

16

Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as The Archivist, Alexander J Newall as Martin 
Blackwood and Mike LeBeau as Tim Stoker.
